title: Academy Awards nominations in 2020 , by film
summary: The statistic illustrates the Number of nominations owned by households in the 2020 from Ford_v_Ferrari to Joker .
In Joker , about 4 % of nominations were owned by American households .
Thus , nominations made up the most popular pet category in the 2020 , with the total Number .

data.Year: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

gold: In 2020 , the movie with the most Oscar nominations was 'Joker ' _ , with 11 in total.
'Joker ' was directed by Todd Philips , whose work includes movies within 'The Hangover ' franchise , 'Due Date ' _ , and 'War Dogs ' _.
Philips also produced major hit ' A Star is Born ' _ .
